ygData.subject: Blast it!
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Bah, I m using Astroblast, I m used to the name, and I like it. ... Astroblast, who has been observing all that has been happening, says in an aside

OOC: Bah, I'm using Astroblast, I'm used to the name, and I like it.

--- Astroblast / Switchblade ---

Astroblast, who has been observing all that has been happening, 
says in an aside voice, only to Megatron, "Lord Megatron it might 
be a good idea to let it go, and tell him where he can find the two 
Maximals. He'll probably give the Maximals a rough time, and keep 
them off our backs for a while." Astroblast murmurs, "We can use 
it, but it can't stay here, Rippersnapper would go ballistic... there 
would be no restraining him." Astroblast leans back to ready, and 
says openly to Megatron, "What should we do with the dissident?" 
Refering to Firestrike.

Unkonwing to Megatron and Astroblast, Switchblade had been 
listening. <<Hmmm, interesting proposistion.>> He frowns at 
Firestrike. "Grrr, DAMNIT... stupid faulty programming..." he says 
trying to cover for Firestrike somewhat, so that he doesn't get 
massacred. "Disable him, and I'll have him repaired." He says to 
Megs. <<I thought that i programmed him to be a follower, not a 
leader... something is really wrong here. Nothing that I can't fix 
anyway.>> He smiles at the last thought, then his face drifts back 
to impassiveness as he prepares for the wrath know as Megatron... 
He only hopes that Megatron doesn't connect him with Firestrike's 
odd behaviour, even HE is baffled.



On 28 Jun 2001, at 6:41, LurkerAbyss wrote:

> ::Slaughter::
> 
>     Slaughter couldn't recall anything too valuable, but he figured he
> should at least tell them who he wanted revenge on and stuff. 
> Menasor's hand around his head really hurt.
> 
>      "Hrrr.......I was once a bot in the Alliance, named Skulletron. 
>      My
> beast mode was a hyena.  But I was no ordinary transformer.  I had and
> still have the ability to "connect" my mind with another's and send
> them images, sounds and other things, and I usually used the ability
> to get me out of a situation or persuade another being.  Ha....This
> ability would be quite useful to any faction.......So, Decepticons,
> kill me, but please.....I have a favor to ask of you........I want you
> to avenge my previous death as Skulletron........Two
> maximals......Two......maximals...........Torca and Klant.......Kill
> them....." Slaughter said.
